trial_type.Description: Congruency status of Probe: whether the correct Probe response depends upon the Cue instructions. (Congruency in eprime output).

Levels.Congruent: Same response (button press) made to the Probe, irrespective of the Cue. Low cognitive control demands.
Levels.Incongruent: Correct response to the Probe depends on the Cue. High cognitive control demands.

trial_cue.Description: Cue (instructions) for each trial (TaskCue in eprime output).

Levels.AttendLetter: Respond with button 1 if the Probe letter is a vowel; button 2 if a consonant.
Levels.AttendNumber: Respond with button 1 if the Probe number is even; button 2 if odd.

trial_switch.Description: Whether the current trial's Cue is the same as that of the previous trial (repeat) or not (switch). (n_Switch in eprime output).

Levels.switch: Current trial Cue is different than that of the previous trial. (n_Switch=1)
Levels.repeat: Current trial Cue is the same as that of the previous trial. (n_Switch=0)

response_time.Description: Time between appearance of Probe and button press (TargetSlide.RT in eprime output).

response_button.Description: Whether the button under the first or second finger of the right hand was pressed. (TargetSlide.RESP in eprime output).

response_accuracy.Description: If the trial response was correct. (TargetSlide.ACC in eprime output).
